::KitKat::

She looked up at Drillbit.  She saw Land Mine standing next to him.  
She screamed and got up and ran up the hillside, "GO AWAY!"
She ran and transformed into wolf mode and ran up hill running as 
fast as she could to get away.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He took her in his arms.
> "grief, my dear. You know you did the right thing, but you still 
feel
> pain for shooting her. I sorry, that there is nothing I can do. I 
wish
> there was." He kissed her.
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 came from his hiding place.
> "K-9, maximize." He wispered, as he transformed. He aimed his plasma
> rifle at the couple. Then he stoped. he couldn't do it. They needed 
to
> be left alone. He ran down the mountin, and came apon the Pred base.
> He saw Maximals attacking. He opened fire on the Predicon cave.
> "Could you Maximals use a hand?!"
